gt Marks

Source: R/gt_misc.R
gt_marks.Rd

gt Marks

Usage

gt_marks(gt_tbl, cols)

Arguments

gt_tbl

A <gt_tbl> object

cols

columns to target

Value

A <gt_tbl> object with marks

Examples

dplyr::tibble(pass = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE)) |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt_marks(cols = pass)



  
pass
